segments.text: Morning Sally ! What's up ? you seem many hurry !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am having an exam at 9 o'clock , It's already 8 thirty .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How are your cases coming along ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very well , thanks , I will probably finish next week , but this is still a lot of work , I have been worked on in for six months , and i ' m so closed to end . I can fill in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , Good for you . It sounds like a lot of work . I'm proud of you ! Is this the red of building ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , It's only 8 forty . Thanks so much !
segments.speaker: S1
